text:
It builds locally. Here is my `make.jl`

```push!(LOAD_PATH, "../src/")

using Documenter, AddToField

makedocs(
	sitename = "AddToField.jl",
	pages = Any[
		"Introduction" => "index.md",
		"API" => "api/api.md"],
	format = Documenter.HTML(
		canonical = "<https://pdeffebach.github.io/AddToField.jl/stable/>"
	))

deploydocs(
    repo = "<http://github.com/pdeffebach/AddToField.jl.git|github.com/pdeffebach/AddToField.jl.git>",
    target = "build",
    deps = nothing,
    make = nothing)```
I have set up the `DOCUMENTER_KEY` secret and the `ssh` environmental variable
